articles.author: Samuel J. White, Philippe B. Wilson
articles.title: Zombie deer disease is spreading and scientists are concerned that it could jump to humans - Phys.org
articles.description: In the tranquil expanses of North America's woodlands and grasslands, a silent but concerning phenomenon is unfolding: chronic wasting disease (CWD). The condition, often dubbed "zombie deer disease", is stealthily spreading among deer populations, sparking c…
